comment.author: 14381622@N00
comment._content: Here's an article about her: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85058396/1916-01-10/ed-... Transcribed: "Miss Cora Ambrosetti is the youngest of the belles from Latin America who are in Washington as visitors to the an Scientific Congress and who have caused much comment in Washington society by their beauty. Miss Ambrosetti is the daughter of Dr. Juan B. Ambrosetti, one of the official delegates from Argentina and professor in the Argentine University."

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Born 1902, so she was almost fourteen here. Father was Juan Bautista Ambrosetti, mother was Maria Elena Holberg; she married Ernesto Roger Pemberton Sanchez de Bustamante, in 1922. They had a daughter, Cora Pemberton Ambrosetti, born 1924. www.genealogiafamiliar.net/getperson.php?personID=I503260... "Ernest and Cora Pemberton" and Maria Elena Ambrosetti are found in this passenger list, for a 1923 voyage: www.ellisisland.org/shipping/FormatTripPass.asp?sship=Ame... Her father's wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juan_Bautista_Ambrosetti
